body.name: ADORNEVE LED Nightstand White Nightstand with Wireless Charging Station 2 Drawers, Modern Bedroom End Side Table with LED Lights, Wooden Sofa Bedside Table with Pull-Out Shelf
features: 【Nightstand with Multifunctional LED Light Strips】-The bedside nightstand comes with beautiful Multi-colour RGB LED Light(There are over 60000 colors to choose from), Phone App + Button Switch multiple control modes. You can freely set the brightness,color,mode and timing function,and design your light show to your heart's content. with LED Lights Nightstand Makes Your Life Smarter，more suitable for your needs.

【Power Strip with Wireless Charging】-The nightstand is arranged with 2 Outlets & 2 USB Ports& Wireless Charging,In order to make charging easier, we have added the wireless charging function, the mobile phone can be stably charged by gently placing it on it, intelligently identify the charging device, and take care of the mobile phone battery to provide you with better and safer charging experience.

【2 Drawers Storage & Pull-Out Tray】-The bedside table has 2 drawer for sliding storage, The sliding drawer is perfect for private, the open space in the middle is convenient for daily use. The phone or cup could also be placed on a tray. Plenty of storage space Great for living room, bedroom, home office.
【Durble & Stable】-Made of premium high-quality MDF wood and exquisite workmanship make this bedside table sturdy and durable, not afraid of long-term use.

【Multifunction】This end table can be placed in any of the place. Therefore, this side table can become a bedside table, end table, sofa side table, nightstands, coffee table and so on. The space-saving design and neutral color will blend well with any furniture whether it is as a bedside table or as a sofa table in your living room.
body.description: LED Nightstand End Table with LED Lights & Power Outlet USB Ports & Wirless Charging & Cabinet & Pull-Out Shelf What color is the mood, what color is the light adjusted to.In the monotonous night, put a different style for your home. Can be wireless and USB charging, to meet the equipment you do different need, is enough for your computer, laptop, and phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid stand, good instructions, looks good!
reviews.reviewText: After returning another nightstand because it was flimsy and the installation instructions were horrible I took another chance on this one. Glad I did! This was a pretty difficult build, but once I had it together it was a solid, aesthetically pleasing, compact nightstand. The LED is ok but the built in charger and accessories outlet is awesome. I recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are exactly what I was looking just and they are decent quality. The build when pretty easy after the first one, part H was the most confusing. I thought they would be a bit bigger but that’s my own fault for not looking at the measurements exactly. Overall, super cute and would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and decent storage
reviews.reviewText: Bought this mainly because it was a good value. Me and my boyfriend are on a budget right now so we didn't want to spend a lot of money on furniture. Target, IKEA, etc. had nightstands but they were more expensive. We wanted something compact with a lot of storage. These nightstands are a decent size and look good in our bedroom. The LED lights are nice and there is a lot of space in the drawers. Not bad for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect bedside table. My daughter was able to put it together by herself in about an hour. Nice to be able to plug in and charge all of your devices. Night light is great. Perfect size. Storage is great. Very sturdy. The slide out tray fits a laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These nightstands look good, and do the job. However, they are not easy to assemble. They bring a lot of pieces and a lot of hardware to put together. Instructions are clear, but it will take you a while to put them together. Quality is definitely not the best, but they seem to be durable after, three weeks of use. One thing to note is that the LED light will need to be plugged into one of the USB ports on the top, making it visible from the top. I decided not to use the LED in my case so I could use both USB charging ports.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very time consuming set up
reviews.reviewText: The install has tons of pieces & takes a few hours to put together. Once it’s complete it’s very cool. Love how you can change the light colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and doesn’t work!
reviews.reviewText: Item takes hours to build and made of cheap paper like materials. The USB ports are too close together and cause the phone to go in and out of charge mode constantly. The wireless port doesn’t work because it’s too close to the edge and the USB ports to fit a phone. Overall piece of junk. Seller won’t honor a return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. After personally struggling putting it together I absolutely LOVE IT. Instructions are extremely easy to follow, just make sure you follow them exactly as shown in the figure. (Put the screws in the right holes or else you'll end up with a lopsided drawer and spend hours figuring out why.) Other than that the assembly process was very easy and straightforward. The drawers are perfectly lined up and they open/close smoothly. Upper drawer is perfect for storing small items no bigger than an inch in height. Wireless charging very convenient if you want less wires in your room. The led lights are a perfect touch for modernizing your room. This is absolutely a perfect night stand! Totally recommend it- 10/10
